    <script>
    // Load Swell/Yotpo Loyalty API on pages that need rewards functionality
    const currentPageURL = window.location.href;
    const currentPath = window.location.pathname;
    
    const shouldLoadSwellAPI = 
        currentPath.includes('/pages/pos-rewards') ||
        currentPath.includes('/pages/rewards') ||
        currentPath.includes('/pages/redeem-rewards') ||
        currentPath.includes('/account') ||
        currentPath.includes('/cart') ||
        currentPageURL.includes('rewards');

    if (shouldLoadSwellAPI) {
        const script = document.createElement("script");
        script.src = "https://cdn-loyalty.yotpo.com/loader/gJHM7UMP22na3oVRFqmR9g.js?shop=next-world.myshopify.com";
        script.async = true;
        script.onload = function() {
            console.log('Swell/Yotpo Loyalty API loaded successfully');
            
            // Wait a moment for the API to initialize, then manually dispatch setup event
            setTimeout(function() {
                if (typeof swellAPI !== 'undefined') {
                    console.log('swellAPI is available, dispatching swell:setup event');
                    const swellSetupEvent = new CustomEvent('swell:setup');
                    document.dispatchEvent(swellSetupEvent);
                } else {
                    console.warn('swellAPI still not available after script load');
                }
            }, 1000);
        };
        script.onerror = function() {
            console.error('Failed to load Swell/Yotpo Loyalty API');
        };
        document.head.appendChild(script);
    }
    </script>

  <script type="text/javascript" defer="">

    (function () {
      try {
        window.EG_INFO = window.EG_INFO || {};
        

          var rawPriceString = "72.00";
    
          rawPriceString = rawPriceString.trim();
    
          var normalisedPrice;

          function processNumberString(str) {
            // Helper to find the rightmost index of '.', ',' or "'"
            const lastDot = str.lastIndexOf('.');
            const lastComma = str.lastIndexOf(',');
            const lastApostrophe = str.lastIndexOf("'");
            const lastIndex = Math.max(lastDot, lastComma, lastApostrophe);

            // If no punctuation, remove any stray spaces and return
            if (lastIndex === -1) {
              return str.replace(/[.,'\s]/g, '');
            }

            // Extract parts
            const before = str.slice(0, lastIndex).replace(/[.,'\s]/g, '');
            const after = str.slice(lastIndex + 1).replace(/[.,'\s]/g, '');

            // If the after part is 1 or 2 digits, treat as decimal
            if (after.length > 0 && after.length <= 2) {
              return `${before}.${after}`;
            }

            // Otherwise treat as integer with thousands separator removed
            return before + after;
          }

          normalisedPrice = processNumberString(rawPriceString)

          window.EG_INFO["42123654168689"] = {
            "price": `${normalisedPrice}`,

      } else if (window.Checkout && window.Checkout.$) {
        jquery = window.Checkout.$;

    var hasLoggedConversion = function(token) {
      if (token) {
        return document.cookie.indexOf('loggedConversion=' + token) !== -1;
      }
      return false;
    }

    var setCookieIfConversion = function(token) {
      if (token) {
        var twoMonthsFromNow = new Date(Date.now());

      sendRequest: function sendRequest(endpointUrl, payload) {
        // Try the sendBeacon API
        if (window && window.navigator && typeof window.navigator.sendBeacon === 'function' && typeof window.Blob === 'function' && !Monorail.isIos12()) {
          var blobData = new window.Blob([payload], {
            type: 'text/plain'
          });

          if (window.navigator.sendBeacon(endpointUrl, blobData)) {
            return true;

          xhr.send(payload);
        } catch (e) {
          console.log(e);
        }

      },

    left: -1.5em;
    -webkit-animation-delay: -.32s;
    animation-delay: -.32s
}

            <button type="submit" class="cart__update-button button button--secondary" form="CartDrawer-Form">
              Update
            </button>
          </noscript>

          <button type="submit" id="CartDrawer-Checkout" class="cart__checkout-button" name="checkout" form="CartDrawer-Form" disabled="">
            checkout
          </button>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</cart-drawer>

<script>
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
    function isIE() {
      const ua = window.navigator.userAgent;
      const msie = ua.indexOf('MSIE ');
      const trident = ua.indexOf('Trident/');

      return msie > 0 || trident > 0;
    }

    if (!isIE()) return;
    const cartSubmitInput = document.createElement('input');
    cartSubmitInput.setAttribute('name', 'checkout');
    cartSubmitInput.setAttribute('type', 'hidden');
    document.querySelector('#cart').appendChild(cartSubmitInput);
    document.querySelector('#checkout').addEventListener('click', function (event) {
      document.querySelector('#cart').submit();
    });
  });
</script>

  <script>
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
      const messageContainer = document.querySelector('.announcement-bar');
      const messages = document.querySelectorAll('.center-msg');
    
      // Function to show the next message in the carousel
      let currentIndex = 0;
    
      function showNextMessage() {
        messages[currentIndex].style.display = 'none';
        currentIndex = (currentIndex + 1) % messages.length;
        messages[currentIndex].style.display = 'flex';
      }
    
      // Variable to hold the interval ID
      let intervalId;
    
      // Variable to track the carousel state
      let isCarouselRunning = false;
    
      // Function to start the carousel
      function startCarousel() {
        messages.forEach(message => message.style.display = 'none');
        messages[0].style.display = 'flex';
        if (!isCarouselRunning) {
          currentIndex = 0;
          intervalId = setInterval(showNextMessage, 5000); // Change this value to adjust the auto-rotate speed (in milliseconds)
          isCarouselRunning = true;
        }
      }
    
      // Function to stop the carousel
      function stopCarousel() {
        clearInterval(intervalId);
        isCarouselRunning = false;
        messages.forEach(message => message.style.display = 'flex');
      }
    
      // Call the startCarousel function to begin the automatic rotation if the screen width is less than 769
      if (window.innerWidth < 769) {
        startCarousel();
      }
    
      // Add an event listener to the window object to check for screen width changes
      window.addEventListener('resize', function() {
        if (window.innerWidth < 769) {
          startCarousel();
        } else {
          stopCarousel();
        }
      });
    });
    
</script>

</div>

  <script>

    function setDividerWidth() {
      const divider = document.getElementById('header-dropdown-top-divider');
      if(!divider) return
      const screenWidth = window.innerWidth;
      divider.style.width = screenWidth + 'px';
    }

// JavaScript code to set the width of the divider div
    window.addEventListener('load', setDividerWidth);
    window.addEventListener('resize', setDividerWidth);
  </script>

  <script>

    function setDividerWidth() {
      const divider = document.getElementById('header-dropdown-top-divider');
      if(!divider) return
      const screenWidth = window.innerWidth;
      divider.style.width = screenWidth + 'px';
    }

// JavaScript code to set the width of the divider div
    window.addEventListener('load', setDividerWidth);
    window.addEventListener('resize', setDividerWidth);
  </script>

  <script>

    function setDividerWidth() {
      const divider = document.getElementById('header-dropdown-top-divider');
      if(!divider) return
      const screenWidth = window.innerWidth;
      divider.style.width = screenWidth + 'px';
    }

// JavaScript code to set the width of the divider div
    window.addEventListener('load', setDividerWidth);
    window.addEventListener('resize', setDividerWidth);
  </script>

</div></div>

  <script>

    function setDividerWidth() {
      const divider = document.getElementById('header-dropdown-top-divider');
      if(!divider) return
      const screenWidth = window.innerWidth;
      divider.style.width = screenWidth + 'px';
    }

// JavaScript code to set the width of the divider div
    window.addEventListener('load', setDividerWidth);
    window.addEventListener('resize', setDividerWidth);
  </script>

</div></div>

  <script>

    function setDividerWidth() {
      const divider = document.getElementById('header-dropdown-top-divider');
      if(!divider) return
      const screenWidth = window.innerWidth;
      divider.style.width = screenWidth + 'px';
    }

// JavaScript code to set the width of the divider div
    window.addEventListener('load', setDividerWidth);
    window.addEventListener('resize', setDividerWidth);
  </script>

  <script>

    function setDividerWidth() {
      const divider = document.getElementById('header-dropdown-top-divider');
      if(!divider) return
      const screenWidth = window.innerWidth;
      divider.style.width = screenWidth + 'px';
    }

// JavaScript code to set the width of the divider div
    window.addEventListener('load', setDividerWidth);
    window.addEventListener('resize', setDividerWidth);
  </script>

<script>
    const passwordInput = document.querySelector(".password-input");
    const eye = document.querySelector("#eye");
    eye.setAttribute('aria-pressed', 'false');
    eye.setAttribute('aria-label', 'show password'); 
  
    eye.addEventListener("click", function(){

      event.preventDefault()
      const type = passwordInput.getAttribute("type") === "password" ? "text" : "password"
      passwordInput.setAttribute("type", type);
      eye.setAttribute('aria-pressed', 'true');
      eye.setAttribute('aria-label', 'hide password'); 

      if(passwordInput.getAttribute("type") === "password") {
        eye.setAttribute('aria-pressed', 'false');
        eye.setAttribute('aria-label', 'show password');
      }
      else if (passwordInput.getAttribute("type") === "text") {
        eye.setAttribute('aria-pressed', 'true');
        eye.setAttribute('aria-label', 'hide password');
      }
    })

   
</script>


</div>




<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    var buttons = document.querySelectorAll('.product-form__submit');
    buttons.forEach(function(button) {
        button.addEventListener('click', function() {
            pushToDataLayer();
        });
    });
});

function pushToDataLayer() {
    var quantityElement = document.querySelector(".quantity__input");
    var quantity = quantityElement ? Number(quantityElement.value) : 1;
    
    const productVariants = [{"id":42123654168689,"title":"0.5 oz \/ 15 g","option1":"0.5 oz \/ 15 g","option2":null,"option3":null,"sku":"210000016212","requires_shipping":true,"taxable":true,"featured_image":{"id":33201548329073,"product_id":7389998088305,"position":1,"created_at":"2025-06-14T22:35:39-07:00","updated_at":"2025-06-15T01:43:34-07:00","alt":null,"width":2656,"height":3320,"src":"\/\/credobeauty.com\/cdn\/shop\/files\/TrueBotanicals_RenewPureRadianceFaceOil_Mini_01.png?v=1749977014","variant_ids":[42123654168689]},"available":true,"name":"Renew Pure Radiance Face Oil - 0.5 oz \/ 15 g","public_title":"0.5 oz \/ 15 g","options":["0.5 oz \/ 15 g"],"price":7200,"weight":14,"compare_at_price":null,"inventory_quantity":122,"inventory_management":"shopify","inventory_policy":"deny","barcode":"816459021783","featured_media":{"alt":null,"id":25298775507057,"position":1,"preview_image":{"aspect_ratio":0.8,"height":3320,"width":2656,"src":"\/\/credobeauty.com\/cdn\/shop\/files\/TrueBotanicals_RenewPureRadianceFaceOil_Mini_01.png?v=1749977014"}},"requires_selling_plan":false,"selling_plan_allocations":[{"price_adjustments":[{"position":1,"price":6480},{"position":2,"price":6840}],"price":6480,"compare_at_price":7200,"per_delivery_price":6480,"selling_plan_id":2389934193,"selling_plan_group_id":"d1c31b7d875f371afdda85ee0906e6c15aee403a"},{"price_adjustments":[{"position":1,"price":6480},{"position":2,"price":6840}],"price":6480,"compare_at_price":7200,"per_delivery_price":6480,"selling_plan_id":2389966961,"selling_plan_group_id":"d1c31b7d875f371afdda85ee0906e6c15aee403a"},{"price_adjustments":[{"position":1,"price":6480},{"position":2,"price":6840}],"price":6480,"compare_at_price":7200,"per_delivery_price":6480,"selling_plan_id":2389999729,"selling_plan_group_id":"d1c31b7d875f371afdda85ee0906e6c15aee403a"},{"price_adjustments":[{"position":1,"price":6480},{"position":2,"price":6840}],"price":6480,"compare_at_price":7200,"per_delivery_price":6480,"selling_plan_id":2390032497,"selling_plan_group_id":"d1c31b7d875f371afdda85ee0906e6c15aee403a"}],"quantity_rule":{"min":1,"max":null,"increment":1}}];
    const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
    const targetVariantId = parseInt(urlParams.get('variant'));

    if(!targetVariantId) return;

    let variant = null;

    for (let v of productVariants) {
        if (v.id === targetVariantId) {
            variant = v;
            break;
        }
    }

    window.dataLayer.push({
        event: "addToCart",
        ecommerce: {
            currencyCode: ShopifyAnalytics.meta.currency,
            add: {
                products: [{
                    name: "Renew Pure Radiance Face Oil",
                    price: 0,
                    brand: "True Botanicals",
                    id: variant.sku || null,
                    variant: variant.title || null,
                    quantity: null,
                    
                }]
            }
        }
    });
}
</script>

<script>
  function hidePlanPickers() {
    var scrollPosition = window.scrollY;
    var viewportWidth = window.innerWidth;

    // Only hide elements if viewport width is greater than 700px and scroll position is greater than 700px
    if (viewportWidth > 700) {
      if (scrollPosition > 700) {
        var planPickers = document.querySelectorAll('#skio-plan-picker-find');
        planPickers.forEach(function(planPicker) {
          planPicker.style.display = 'none';
        });
      } else {
        var planPickers = document.querySelectorAll('#skio-plan-picker-find');
        planPickers.forEach(function(planPicker) {
          planPicker.style.display = ''; // Reset display property if conditions are not met
        });
      }
    } else {
      var planPickers = document.querySelectorAll('#skio-plan-picker-find');
      planPickers.forEach(function(planPicker) {
        planPicker.style.display = ''; // Ensure they are visible on mobile
      });
    }
  }

  // Run the function on page load
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', hidePlanPickers);

  // Run the function on window scroll and resize
  window.addEventListener('scroll', hidePlanPickers);
  window.addEventListener('resize', hidePlanPickers);
</script>

<script>
  function hidePlanPickers() {
    var scrollPosition = window.scrollY;
    var viewportWidth = window.innerWidth;

    // Only hide elements if viewport width is greater than 700px and scroll position is greater than 700px
    if (viewportWidth > 700) {
      if (scrollPosition > 700) {
        var planPickers = document.querySelectorAll('#skio-plan-picker-find');
        planPickers.forEach(function(planPicker) {
          planPicker.style.display = 'none';
        });
      } else {
        var planPickers = document.querySelectorAll('#skio-plan-picker-find');
        planPickers.forEach(function(planPicker) {
          planPicker.style.display = ''; // Reset display property if conditions are not met
        });
      }
    } else {
      var planPickers = document.querySelectorAll('#skio-plan-picker-find');
      planPickers.forEach(function(planPicker) {
        planPicker.style.display = ''; // Ensure they are visible on mobile
      });
    }
  }

  // Run the function on page load
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', hidePlanPickers);

  // Run the function on window scroll and resize
  window.addEventListener('scroll', hidePlanPickers);
  window.addEventListener('resize', hidePlanPickers);
</script>


                
    </div>
  </section>

<script>
var productId = '7389998088305';
const apiUrl = 'https://api.poweredbyhue.app/shoppers-api/v1/storefront/product/' + productId + '/config';

fetch(apiUrl)
  .then(response => {
    if (response.ok) {
      return response.json();
    } else {
      throw new Error('Network response was not ok with status code: ' + response.status);
    }
  })
  .then(data => {
    console.log('Product configuration:', data);
    if(data.isQuizEnabled){
      var elements = document.getElementsByClassName('shadefinder-element');
      var element = document.getElementById('shadefinder-element');
      if (element) {
          element.style.display = "block";
      }

      for (var i = 0; i < elements.length; i++) {
          elements[i].style.display = 'block';
      }

      var anchorElements = document.querySelectorAll('.product-form__currentColorVariant');

      anchorElements.forEach(function(element) {
          var ctaPoweredDiv = document.createElement('div');
          ctaPoweredDiv.className = 'ttq-container';

          var quizAnchor = document.createElement('a');
          quizAnchor.href = "#";
          quizAnchor.setAttribute('data-hue-trigger', 'quiz');
          quizAnchor.className = 'top-cta';
          quizAnchor.textContent = 'find your shade';

          ctaPoweredDiv.appendChild(quizAnchor);

          var poweredDiv = document.createElement('div');
          poweredDiv.className = 'powered';

          var poweredImage = document.createElement('img');
          poweredImage.src = "https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/2220/1513/files/poweredbyHue_text_DP_1_3x_2356958f-630b-4185-be35-44fe5df73458.png?v=1689938105";
          poweredImage.alt = "";

          poweredDiv.appendChild(poweredImage);

          ctaPoweredDiv.appendChild(poweredDiv);

          element.appendChild(ctaPoweredDiv);
      });
    }

    if(data.isReviewEnabled) {
      var relements = document.getElementsByClassName('shadefinder-review-element');
      for (var i = 0; i < relements.length; i++) {
          relements[i].style.display = 'block';
      }
    }

  })
  .catch(error => {
    console.error('There has been a problem with your fetch operation:', error);
  });
</script>

<!-- Static tooltips -->
<div id="tooltip-template" style="background-color: white; box-shadow: 0px 0px 2px gray; display: none;">
  <h3 class="ingredient-title" id="tooltip-title"></h3>
  <div>
    <p id="tooltip-description"></p>
  </div>
  <hr>
  <a href="/pages/our-mission" class="ingredient-clearforme-label" target="_blank">Learn more about our mission</a>
</div>

<script>

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
const tooltips = [
  {
    id: "cruelty-free-tooltip",
    title: "Cruelty Free",
    description: "This product does not use animal testing anywhere in its supply chain or pre- or post-market testing. Please note that all products sold at Credo are cruelty free."
  },
  {
    id: "sustainable-packaging-tooltip",
    title: "Sustainable Packaging",
    description: "This product uses refillable components, or glass, paper, post-consumer recycled plastic, or bio-based plastic."
  },
  {
    id: "vegan-tooltip",
    title: "Vegan",
    description: "The ingredients used in the final product are not derived from animals nor do they contain any animal byproducts. Please note, all products sold at Credo Beauty are cruelty-free."
  },
  {
    id: "gluten-free-tooltip",
    title: "Gluten Free",
    description: "This product does not contain wheat, hydrolyzed wheat protein, barley, oat, or oat derivatives (which may have been cross-contaminated with wheat). Brands are required to conduct third-party testing to make a gluten-free claim on the final product."
  },
  {
    id: "alcohol-free-tooltip",
    title: "Alcohol Free",
    description: "This product does not contain ethyl alcohol. Please note that cosmetic products labeled 'alcohol free' may contain other alcohols, such as cetyl, stearyl, cetearyl, or lanolin alcohol, known as fatty alcohols, which have different effects on the skin than ethyl alcohol."
  },
  {
    id: "soy-free-tooltip",
    title: "Soy Free",
    description: "Ingredients used in this product do not contain soy or soy protein."
  },
  {
    id: "paraben-free-tooltip",
    title: "Paraben Free",
    description: "The final product does not contain parabens."
  },
  {
    id: "fragrance-free-tooltip",
    title: "Fragrance Free",
    description: "The final product does not contain added fragrance or masking ingredients (including natural fragrances, like essential oils)."
  },
  {
    id: "organic-tooltip",
    title: "Organic",
    description: "This product contains at least 70% certified organic material as per the California Organic Products Act (COPA) of 2003. Some products may be 'Certified Organic,' meaning they contain 95% or more organic agricultural material and are USDA certified."
  },
  {
    id: "non-gmo-tooltip",
    title: "Non-GMO",
    description: "A product that does not contain ingredients derived from genetically engineered crops."
  },
  {
    id: "full-fragrance-transparency-tooltip",
    title: "Full Fragrance Transparency",
    description: "Fragrance ingredients used in the final product are fully disclosed to the consumer. Please see the Ingredients tab for more."
  }
];

  const badgesWrapper = document.querySelector('.badges_innerwrapper');
  if (badgesWrapper) {
    tooltips.forEach(tooltip => {
      const tooltipTemplate = document.getElementById('tooltip-template').cloneNode(true);
      tooltipTemplate.id = tooltip.id;
      tooltipTemplate.style.display = 'none';
      tooltipTemplate.querySelector('#tooltip-title').textContent = tooltip.title;
      tooltipTemplate.querySelector('#tooltip-description').textContent = tooltip.description;

      badgesWrapper.appendChild(tooltipTemplate);
      tooltipTemplate.classList.add('ingredient-tooltip_wrapper');
    });
  } else {
    console.error("Element with class 'badges_innerwrapper' not found.");
  }

  const badges = document.querySelectorAll('.product-badge');
  let currentlyOpenTooltip = null;

  badges.forEach(function(badge) {
    const badgeId = badge.id;
    const tooltipId = badgeId.replace('-badge', '-tooltip');
    const tooltip = document.getElementById(tooltipId);

    if (tooltip) {
      badge.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
        event.stopPropagation();

        if (currentlyOpenTooltip && currentlyOpenTooltip !== tooltip) {
          hideTooltip(currentlyOpenTooltip);
        }

        if (tooltip.style.display === 'block') {
          hideTooltip(tooltip);
          currentlyOpenTooltip = null;
        } else {
          showTooltip(tooltip, event);
          currentlyOpenTooltip = tooltip;
        }
      });
    }
  });

  // Add a global click listener to close tooltips when clicking outside
  document.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
    if (currentlyOpenTooltip) {
      const clickedInsideTooltip = currentlyOpenTooltip.contains(event.target);
      const clickedOnBadge = event.target.closest('.product-badge');

      if (!clickedInsideTooltip && !clickedOnBadge) {
        hideTooltip(currentlyOpenTooltip);
        currentlyOpenTooltip = null;
      }
    }
  });

  function showTooltip(tooltip, event) {
    hideAllTooltips();
    tooltip.style.display = 'block';
    tooltip.style.position = 'absolute';
    tooltip.style.zIndex = '1000';
    positionTooltip(tooltip, event.target);
  }

  function hideTooltip(tooltip) {
    tooltip.style.display = 'none';
  }

  function hideAllTooltips() {
    const allTooltips = document.querySelectorAll('.ingredient-tooltip_wrapper');
    allTooltips.forEach(function(tooltip) {
      tooltip.style.display = 'none';
    });
    currentlyOpenTooltip = null;
  }

  function positionTooltip(tooltip, badge) {
    const badgeRect = badge.getBoundingClientRect();
    const tooltipRect = tooltip.getBoundingClientRect();

    let left = badgeRect.left + (badgeRect.width / 2) - (tooltipRect.width / 2);
    let top = badgeRect.bottom + window.scrollY + 10;

    if (left < 10) {
      left = 10;
    } else if (left + tooltipRect.width > window.innerWidth - 10) {
      left = window.innerWidth - tooltipRect.width - 10;
    }

    if (top + tooltipRect.height > window.innerHeight + window.scrollY - 10) {
      top = badgeRect.top + window.scrollY - tooltipRect.height - 10;
    }

    if (top < window.scrollY + 10) {
      top = window.scrollY + 10;
    }

    tooltip.style.left = `${left}px`;
    tooltip.style.top = `${top}px`;
  }
});
</script>
        </div>
        <div id="shade" data-tab-content="">
          <link href="//credobeauty.com/cdn/shop/t/1021/assets/section-product-details.css?v=45288840663369762291749493751" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" media="all">




<div class="detailscontent shade">
  <div class="shade_textwrapper">

    <div class="detailscontent-left shade">
      <h5 class="h5 shade-title">What is an undertone?</h5>
      <p class="p detailscontent-p">
        An undertone is the color beneath the surface of your skin, which never changes (even with a tan). There are three types of undertones:
      </p>

      <p class="p bold detailscontent-p-bold">Pink/Cool</p>
      <p class="p detailscontent-p">
        I see red or pink undertones around the perimeter of my face and neck.<br>My skin burns easily, but barely tans.<br>My skin looks better in silver jewelry than gold.
      </p>

      <p class="p bold detailscontent-p-bold">Neutral</p>
      <p class="p detailscontent-p">
        I see both pink and yellow undertones around the perimeter of my face and neck.<br>My skin sometimes burns and sometimes tans.<br>My skin looks good in both gold and silver jewelry.
      </p>
  
      <p class="p bold detailscontent-p-bold">Yellow/Warm</p>
      <p class="p detailscontent-p">
        I see yellow or golden undertones around the perimeter of my face and neck.<br>My skin rarely burns, but tans easily.<br>My skin looks better in gold jewelry than silver.
      </p>
      
    </div>

<!--     <div class="detailscontent-middle shade">
      <p class="p bold detailscontent-p-bold">Warm</p>
      <p class="p detailscontent-p">
        The warm shades flatter those with subtle yellow undertones. If you find that foundation shades sometimes appear
        pink on your skin, the warm range will be the match for you.
      </p>
      <p class="p bold detailscontent-p-bold">Olive</p>
      <p class="p detailscontent-p">
        If you try neutral shades or beige shades and find that they aren't quite right, olive may be the match for you.
        The olive shades usually suit those with neutral brown undertones. Please note that Olive shades run deeper than
        other undertones.
      </p>
      <p class="p bold detailscontent-p-bold">Olive</p>
      <p class="p detailscontent-p">
        If you try neutral shades or beige shades and find that they aren't quite right, olive may be the match for you.
        The olive shades usually suit those with neutral brown undertones. Please note that Olive shades run deeper than
        other undertones.
      </p>
    </div> -->
  
    
  </div>

<script>
  const tabs = document.querySelectorAll('[data-tab-target]');
  const tabContents = document.querySelectorAll('[data-tab-content]');

  tabs.forEach((tab) => {
    tab.addEventListener('click', () => {
      const target = document.querySelector(tab.dataset.tabTarget);
      tabContents.forEach((tabContent) => {
        tabContent.classList.remove('active');
      });
      tabs.forEach((tab) => {
        tab.classList.remove('active');
      });
      tab.classList.add('active');
      target.classList.add('active');
    });
  });
</script>

<div class="mobile-bottom-bar">
    <div class="mobile-bar-content">
        <button class="close-btn" onclick="closeMobileBar()">Ã—</button>
        <div class="content">
            <h2>Added to bag</h2>
            <div class="bag-buttons">
                <a class="cta-button-bordered mobile-bottom-bar-buttons" href="/cart" id="mobile-bottom-cart"><span>View Bag (0)</span></a>
                <a class="cta-button mobile-bottom-bar-buttons" href="/checkout">Checkout</a>

<script>

    function startCartBubbleListener() {
        setTimeout(function() {
            closeMobileBar()
        }, 6000)
    }

    function openMobileBar() {
        var bar = document.querySelector('.mobile-bottom-bar');
        var content = bar.querySelector('.mobile-bar-content');

        setTimeout(function() {
            bar.style.animation = "slideUp 0.3s forwards";    
            bar.style.display = 'flex';
        }, 50);
        startCartBubbleListener()
    }

    function closeMobileBar() {
        var bar = document.querySelector('.mobile-bottom-bar');
        var content = bar.querySelector('.mobile-bar-content');
        
        bar.style.animation = "slideDown 0.3s forwards";
        
        setTimeout(function() {
            bar.style.display = 'none';
            content.style.animation = '';
        }, 300);
    }

    function listenerAddToCartModal() {
        const listenToQuickAddInterval = setInterval(listenToQuickAddIntervalTimer, 500)
        function quickButtonListener(button) {
            button.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
                openMobileBar()
            })
            clearInterval(listenToQuickAddInterval)
        }
        function listenToQuickAddIntervalTimer() {
            const quickAddButton = document.querySelector('.product-form .product-form__submit.add-to-cart')
            if (!quickAddButton) return
            quickButtonListener(quickAddButton)
        }
    }

    const buttons = document.querySelectorAll('.newQuickAdd__submit, .product-form__submit');
    buttons.forEach(button => {
      if (button.innerText.trim().toUpperCase() !== "CHOOSE OPTIONS") {
        button.addEventListener('click', openMobileBar);
      }
      button.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
        if (button.innerText.trim().toUpperCase() === 'CHOOSE OPTIONS') listenerAddToCartModal()
      })
    })

</script></div>

<script>
  function toggleAccordion(element) {
    const accordionHeader = element;
    const accordion = accordionHeader.parentNode;
    const accordionDropdown = accordion.querySelector('.accordion-dropdown');
    const isActive = accordion.classList.contains('active');

    const accordionHeaders = document.querySelectorAll('.accordion-header');
    const allAccordionParents = document.querySelectorAll('.accordion-header-parent');
    const allAccordions = document.querySelectorAll('.accordion');
    const allAccordionDropdowns = document.querySelectorAll('.accordion-dropdown');
    
    allAccordions.forEach((accordion) => {
      accordion.classList.remove('active');
    });
    allAccordionParents.forEach((accordion) => {
      accordion.classList.remove('active');
    });

    accordionHeaders.forEach((header) => {
      header.classList.remove('expanded');
    });
    allAccordionDropdowns.forEach((accordionDropdown) => {
      accordionDropdown.style.display = 'none';
      accordionDropdown.classList.remove('dropdown-expanded');
    });
          
    if (!isActive) {
      accordionHeader.classList.add('expanded');
      accordion.classList.add('active');
      accordionDropdown.style.display = 'block';
      accordionDropdown.classList.add('dropdown-expanded');
    } else {
      accordionHeader.classList.remove('expanded');
      accordion.classList.remove('active');
      accordionDropdown.style.display = 'none';
      accordionDropdown.classList.remove('dropdown-expanded');
    }
  }
</script>

<script>
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded',  () => {
    function swymCallbackFn() {
      // your API calls go here over ride the swym cart api to support custom slider cart 
      var replayAddToCartOriginalFn = _swat.replayAddToCart;
  
      subscribe(PUB_SUB_EVENTS.cartUpdate, (event) => {
        window._swat.initializeActionButtons('.cart-items__section')
        window._swat.initializeActionButtons('#CartDrawer')
      });

      document.addEventListener('product-card:refresh', () => {
        window._swat.initializeActionButtons('#ProductGridContainer')
      })
      
      window._swat.replayAddToCart = function() {
        //save the successCallback
        var successCallbackFn = arguments[2];
        arguments[2] = function(data) {
          if (successCallbackFn && updateThirdPartyCartFn) {
            successCallbackFn(data);
            updateThirdPartyCartFn(data);
          };
        }
        //call the orginal fn
        replayAddToCartOriginalFn.apply(this, arguments);
      };
      //runs on success callback.
      function updateThirdPartyCartFn(productData) {
        // Successfully added to cart API, Now call your slider cart here.
        publish(PUB_SUB_EVENTS.cartUpdate, { source: 'swym' });
      }
    }
    if (!window.SwymCallbacks) {
      window.SwymCallbacks = [];
    }
    window.SwymCallbacks.push(swymCallbackFn);
  })

</script>
<style id="swym-product-view-defaults">
  /* Hide when not loaded */
  .swym-button.swym-add-to-wishlist-view-product:not(.swym-loaded){
    display: none;
  }
</style>

  function swymCallbackFn(swat){
    document.addEventListener("swym:collections-loaded", function(){
      swat.initializeActionButtons('.drawer__cart-items-wrapper')
      swat.initializeActionButtons('.cart__items')
    })
  }
  if(!window.SwymCallbacks){
    window.SwymCallbacks = [];
  }
  window.SwymCallbacks.push(swymCallbackFn);

</script>

        -moz-box-shadow: 0 0 0 0 rgba(255, 0, 0, 0);
        box-shadow: 0 0 0 0 rgba(255, 0, 0, 0);
      }
    }

      overflow-x: hidden;
